documents.document: Loved It!!! Having checked out of a hostel and stumbled upon the stanford, both me and my partner were amazed at the standard of the hotel, the room was fantastic, HUGE bed!! great room, all the facilities we needed, lots of coffee, hairdryer, massive bathroom with a great shower, really happy, i left my comments when i left and they even wrote me a letter back in England thanking me for the comments, working in a hotel myself i was pleasantly suprised at this lovely hotel :)
